ModMetaData.name: Goosegun (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Andreas Pardeike, Halicade
ModMetaData.description:
Honk honk! Changes: Added checks so that goose will not spawn in walls. Rebuilt 1.5 and 1.6 for this. Originally made by Brrainz/pardeike. Removing his contact info so y'all don't spam him unnecessarily with "1.6 when???". - Halicade
Original link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2137597811 Original github: https://github.com/pardeike/GooseGun
